thread.title: Galaxy S8 pricing leaks out ahead of Samsung’s March 29th unveiling
thread.title_full: Galaxy S8 pricing leaks out ahead of Samsung’s March 29th unveiling

author: Yoni Heisler
title: Galaxy S8 pricing leaks out ahead of Samsung’s March 29th unveiling
text:
With Samsung's Unpacked event now just 9 days away, there's really not much we don't already know about the company's upcoming Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus. From Geekbench 4 benchmark results down to camera specs and RAM, various leaks over the past few months have spilled almost everything worth knowing about Samsung's next-gen smartphone lineup. In fact, the only thing we haven't been able to get a firm read on thus far is pricing. That is, until now.
Continue reading...

Elon Musk’s lab forced bots to create their own language Siri has a very unfortunate response when you ask it for prostitutes Samsung has done the impossible with the Galaxy S8
